newsfeed.text: New map data: is your favorite singletrack iced over? Explore 100 miles of regional canal and rail trails, with the addition of the Erie Canal, Genesee Valley Greenway, and Genesee Riverway trails.
New map data: Cobbs Hill Park and Washington Grove.

New map data: Auburn Trail (Victor portions) and Lehigh Valley Black Diamond Trail, including connections to the Seneca Trail, are now included. Thanks to Victor Hiking Trails (www.victorhikingtrails.org) for their contributions. We're working on adding more Victor and Pittsford area trail maps.
The #TrailsRoc app will now automatically download new map data and news alerts.
